title: Fraction of Photosynthetically Active Radiation (fPAR)
description: Continental monthly time series MODIS-fPAR for April 2000 - April 2012 derived from NASA MODIS satellite imagery (MOD13Q1). fPAR is defined as the Fraction of photosynthetically active radiation (fPAR) intercepted by the sunlit vegetation canopy and is a measure of vegetation greenness
